headline: A Texas first: CenterPoint Energy announces historic installation of weather station network to monitor severe weather, including hurricanes, across Greater Houston
summary: Today, CenterPoint Energy (NYSE: CNP) announced that, as part of the Greater Houston Resiliency Initiative (GHRI) and its actions to prepare for the 2025 hurricane season, the company has begun installing the first wave of weather monitoring stations to enhance situational awareness during severe weather events. headline: CenterPoint Energy Stock Gets A Composite Rating Upgrade
summary: CenterPoint Energy stock saw an improvement in its IBD SmartSelect Composite Rating Monday, from 93 to 96.  The revised score means the stock currently tops 96% of all other stocks in terms of key performance metrics and technical strength.  Is CenterPoint Energy Stock A Buy?
